Third Party Software

The code in this folder is based on third party work. It is provided solely for the purpose of demonstrating that our system can host third party plugins of significant complexity with little or no modification. The code is provided on the "as is" basis, without warranties of any kind. Copyright for this work belongs to the respectie owners.

SmithHtmlEditor

This project was downloaded from http://smithhtmleditor.codeplex.com/

License information is available at http://smithhtmleditor.codeplex.com/license

MoleculeViewer

This is a derived work of a project downloaded from http://3dmoleculeviewer.codeplex.com/

License information is available at http://3dmoleculeviewer.codeplex.com/license

The code was slightly modified from its original version to convert WPF window (MainWindow.xaml) to a UserControl, and to convert Mocule Viewer from executable (EXE) to a class library (DLL).
